name: Oliver Grayson

physical_specifications.posture: Slightly forward-leaning with restless energy; quick head movements.
physical_specifications.build: Skinny kid frame — narrow shoulders, thin arms and legs, slight chest, youthful proportions. Emphasis on agility and lightness rather than muscle.

facial_structure.face_shape: Round with boyish cheeks and small chin.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Vivid lavender-purple (HEX #9370DB) — achieved through a specialized purple tanning process for the role.

hair.style: Short, smooth, and styled upward at the front; deep navy-black (HEX #101820) with a subtle violet sheen under light.

costume.material: Matte stretch composite with smooth micro-weave; snug, wrinkle-free fit; hidden back zipper; subtle seam lines at shoulders, hips, and along outer thighs for realism.
costume.bodysuit: Two‑tone short‑sleeve leotard. Upper torso and shoulders in bright crimson red (HEX #D32F2F). Lower section forming shorts in deep charcoal black (HEX #1C1C1C). Clean vertical seam centered on torso for emblem alignment.
costume.emblem: Stylized yellow 'O' insignia with vertical bar, centered on chest; high‑contrast golden yellow (HEX #F5C400); crisp edges with slightly raised applique texture.
costume.mask: Matte black (HEX #111111) domino mask integrated to face paint area; smooth edges, no glossy reflections; covers eye area and bridge of nose.
costume.gloves: Wrist‑length hero gloves in golden yellow (HEX #F5C400), minimal paneling, subtle knuckle creases.
costume.boots: Calf‑high hero boots in matching golden yellow (HEX #F5C400); rounded toe, low profile heel; faint outsole tread detail.
costume.piping_and_trim: Thin black piping (HEX #000000) separating red torso from black shorts; stitching intentionally visible on close‑ups for realism.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Characters, These are the Real-Life Actors/Actresses who play the Hero Characters in the Movie, they are wearing full Hero Costumes and Gear

voice_style: Target: Christian Convery as Oliver performance — clear teen tenor; cadence eager, quick; ~165 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts.
